text: Harry Bardle (born 18 June 2000) is a rugby league footballer who plays as a for Hull Kingston Rovers in the Super League. ==Background== Bardle was born in Kingston upon Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire, England. ==Career== In 2019 he made his Hull Kingston Rovers Super League début against the Huddersfield Giants. ==References== ==External links== *Hull KR profile *SL profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby league props Category:Hull Kingston Rovers players
title: Harry Bardle
